title: Login with valid credentials
description: Check that a user can successfully log in using correct username/email and password along with valid activation code.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Input valid activation code
Click login button
Verify user is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: Request activation code
description: Verify that a user can request an activation code, and the system sends it correctly to the administrator email.

steps.description: Navigate to activation code request page
Fill in required user information for activation code
Submit activation code request
Check that activation code is generated and sent to administrator email

title: Registration with valid activation code
description: Check the registration flow works properly when user provides a valid activation code.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid activation code
Fill registration form with valid user data
Submit registration form
Verify user account is created and redirected to dashboard

title: Invalid login attempt with wrong credentials
description: Verify system rejects login attempts with invalid username/email, password, or activation code.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Input invalid or missing activation code
Click login button
Display appropriate error message and deny access

title: Invite collaborator flow
description: Verify owner/admin can invite collaborators by email and that invitee receives email with invitation link.

steps.description: Navigate to collaborators management page
Enter collaborator email and assign role
Send invitation
Check system sends email with valid invitation link

title: Collaborator accepts invitation
description: Validate that invited collaborator can accept invite, create or log in to account, and is assigned correct permissions.

steps.description: Access invitation link from email
Create new account or log in
Accept the invitation
Confirm collaborator is added to company with assigned role and permissions

title: Verify permissions for collaborators
description: Ensure that collaborators have access only to functionalities permitted by their roles.

steps.description: Login as collaborator with specific role
Attempt access to allowed features
Access granted to allowed features
Attempt access to features outside of permissions
Access denied and appropriate message shown

title: Create a new company
description: Verify user can register a new company with all required fields and data validation.

steps.description: Navigate to new company registration page
Fill company form with valid data (razao_social, cnpj, etc.)
Submit the form
Company is created and visible in company list

title: Add and edit chart of accounts
description: Verify user can add new accounts with hierarchical structure, assign categories, and edit existing accounts.

steps.description: Navigate to chart of accounts page
Add new account with valid code, name, type, and category
New account appears correctly in hierarchy
Edit existing account details
Changes are saved and displayed

title: Record financial transaction (lancamento)
description: Validate the ability to record a financial transaction linked to appropriate account and verify data stored correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to new financial transaction page
Input transaction details including date, value, description, and linked account
Submit the transaction
Transaction recorded and visible in transactions list

title: Register accounts payable with status and attachment
description: Verify user can create accounts payable with required fields, upload payment receipts, and mark as paid with status update.

steps.description: Navigate to new account payable page
Input provider, amount, due date, and other details
Upload payment receipt as attachment
Mark account as paid
Status changes to paid and attachment is accessible

title: System generates financial entries automatically after payment
description: Ensure system automatically creates financial entries in the DRE after marking accounts payable as paid.

steps.description: Mark an accounts payable record as paid
System generates corresponding financial entry in the DRE automatically
Check DRE and reports for updated values
Financial data is updated and consistent

title: Dashboard data and chart loading
description: Verify that the dashboard displays correct financial indicators and charts of margins and evolution without loading errors.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard page
Dashboard loads all indicators and charts correctly
Data shown corresponds to current financial transactions and is up to date

title: Generate and export reports with filters
description: Validate user can select report type, apply filters (e.g. date range), view report data, and export report correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to reports page
Select a report type such as DRE or cash flow
Apply period and other filters
Generate the report
Report data is displayed correctly
Use export functionality to download report
Exported report file is correct and complete

title: System security with Row Level Security (RLS)
description: Verify that data separation between companies is enforced and users cannot access data from other companies.

steps.description: Login as user associated with a specific company
Attempt to access data belonging to other companies via UI and API
Access is denied and data leakage is prevented

title: Responsive design on mobile devices
description: Ensure the interface adapts and functions correctly on different screen sizes including mobile devices and PWA platforms.

steps.description: Open the application on various screen sizes and devices (mobile, tablet, desktop)
UI components render properly without layout issues
All interactive elements are accessible and usable

title: Uploading and accessing payment proof attachments
description: Verify users can upload payment proof files for accounts payable and retrieve them later without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to account payable form
Upload valid payment proof file
Save the record
File upload is successful and accessible from account details

title: Handling of expired or invalid activation codes
description: Ensure system handles attempts to use expired, invalid, or already used activation codes properly during registration.

steps.description: Try to register using expired or invalid activation code
Appropriate error message is shown and registration is blocked

title: System configuration and Supabase connection test
description: Validate configuration page correctly shows system settings and the Supabase connection test correctly reports connection status.

steps.description: Navigate to configuration page
Review current system settings
Run Supabase connection test
Connection test indicates success if environment variables are correct

title: Notifications for upcoming accounts payable due dates
description: Ensure users receive notifications for accounts payable nearing their due dates as per configured system logic.

steps.description: Create accounts payable with upcoming due dates
System displays notifications or alerts for those due soon
